p: Nitrite (NO 2 −) levels, an index of cellular NO production, in culture supernatants of RAW264.7 cells were determined using a modified Griess reagent as described previously. 25 Briefly, cells were seeded at 1×10 6 cells/mL in 24-well culture plates. After a 24 h cultivation, these cells were treated with DCEO at various concentrations for 1 h and then at the presence or absence of LPS (100 ng/mL) for 24 h. The supernatant was mixed with an equal volume of Griess reagent and incubated at room temperature for 15 min. Absorbance at 540 nm was measured with a NaNO 2 standard curve, and nitrite production was determined. Four replicate wells were used in this experiment.
